title: Chinese pork curry
ingredients: ['450g pork fillet', '2 tablespoons vegetable oil', '3 cloves garlic, peeled', '1 or 2 star anise', '1 teaspoon freshly chopped ginger', '6 spring onions, sliced', '2 teaspoons cornflour', '2 teaspoons curry powder', '250ml water or stock', '2 tablespoons Chinese rice wine or sherry', '1/4 teaspooons salt', '2 teaspoons sugar', '2 tablespoons soy sauce']
